## 1. Install R v4.5.1 (Latest)

Please, download the latest R version based on the system you use.

-   [Download R for Windows](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/R-4.5.1-win.exe)

-   [Download R for Linux](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/linux/)

-   [Download R for macOS](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/)

## 2. Install RStudio (Latest)

After downloading R, please download RStudio from following link.

-   [Download RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download)

## 4. Install R packages (Optional)

Please, install following packages only if you're able to. 

For this, Open RStudio > Go to R console > Copy/paste following two codes.

`install.packages("remotes");`

`remotes::install_github("bjungbogati/rsetup");`
